湌湌湌

湌字的基本解释

湌
cān
同“餐”。

湌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cān］
［《廣韻》七安切，平寒，清。］
亦作“湌1”。亦作“飧2”。亦作“飡1”。亦作“飱2”。
(1)吃，吞食。
(2)指喝，饮。
(3)给吃，使吃。
(4)饭食。
(5)指小食，充饥的点心。
(6)犹听，闻。
(7)欣赏，赞美。
(8)受；挨。特指受杖责，挨打。
(9)量词。饮食的顿数。
(10)通“”。鱼名。即鲦鱼。
[②]［sūn］
［《集韻》蘇昆切，平魂，心。］
亦作“湌2”。通“飧1”。
水泡饭；熟食。

湌字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　湌； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页636第24
【唐韻】七安切【集韻】千安切，?音?。與餐同。【說文】吞也。或从水。

湌字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
湌字的起名意思

暂无。

Y
Basic explanation of words
Y
cān
Same as "meal".
Y
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cān］
["Guangyun" Qi Anqi, Ping Han, Qing. ]
Also known as "湌1". Also known as "飧2". Also known as "飡1". Also known as "飱2".
(1) Eat, swallow.
(2) Refers to drinking and drinking.
(3) To eat, to eat.
(4) Meals.
(5) Refers to snacks, snacks to satisfy hunger.
(6) Still listening and smelling.
(7) Appreciation, praise.
(8) Accept; endure. Especially referring to being blamed and beaten.
(9) Quantifiers. The number of meals.
(10) Pass "". The name of the fish. That is minnows.
[②]［sūn］
["Jiyun" Su Kunqie, calm soul, heart. ]
Also known as "湌2". Same as "飧1".
Rice in blister; cooked food.
Y
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　湌; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 636 24
[Tang Yun] Qi Anqie [Jiyun] Qian Anqie, sound? Same as meal. [Said the text] Tun also. Or from water.
